description: ACTIVE BAMBOO HYDRATING and ANTI AGING EYE CREAM

At Active Bamboo, we scrutinized all aspects of the R&D process for this Eye Cream to ensure you are getting nothing but the best that advance American science has to offer.  The sensitive yet delicate skin around your eyes calls for this hydrating and rejuvenating eye cream with anti aging and anti oxidant properties.  Active Bamboo's Hydrating and Advance Aging Defense Eye Cream intensely hydrates for soft, radiant skin and youthful-looking eyes.  ✿ Natural, Vegan, and 0rganic ingredients that are GMO free. ✿ Nourishing/Hydrating Eye Cream in a 1 oz high quality and luxury silver airless bottle for easy on-the-go application. ✿ Clinically tested to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while minimizing puffiness around the eyes ✿ Contains lightweight and high quality ingredients to nourish and enhance skin's radiance ✿ Formulated and developed for normal and combination skin. ✿ Dermatologist Tested and clinically researched Formulation without Parabens, Phthalates, Petrolatum and SLS

The item is packed in its own box showing the Hydration Bamboo design. When shipped directly by the seller, it will be mailed in the bubble mailer. Please note, due to transit the box may get wrinkles but the seal should be intact on the box.
